message: Let's split it 50/50 and start with a fair share
You rejected the fair split, now I'll take a bit more
You're taking advantage of inflation, I want a fairer share
You took 20, I'll take 55, let's end this
You offered me a bad deal, now I'll take 70%
70% is too much, I'm not going down without a fight
You're taking too much, I'll give you 40, but that's as low as I'll go
You're still being too generous, I'll take 85%
85% is unacceptable, I'll take a risk and wait for a better offer
I'll give you 80, but you have to agree to meet me for a free lunch if I win
No lunch, no deal. I'll take 90%
90% is outrageous, I'll try to hold on for a few more rounds
I'll give you 95, just please don't leave me with nothing
